(Editorial Search Platform, ESP) which was implemented in order to improve the search results and train the Algorithm used to generate search results. Worked as a contractor through Workforce Logic. 
 
Job Responsibilities 
 
Executed a variety of editorial projects to measure data quality across Yahoo!'s web search product line. Identified web search Spam and analyzed user session data to establish query intent. Member of spot-check team which evaluated the performance of other Analysts. 
Analyzed the search results in order to determine their relevance in terms of the search query (Relevance testing) and ranked them in order of which they would appear on the search results page. This included actual relevance and perceived relevance testing 
Analyzed the search results using their TAU(Title, Abstract, URL) 
Performed news slotting(tests for perceiving news shortcut results) and local slotting(local shortcuts)test 
Analyzed the results in terms of relatedness to the search query term 
Analyzed the results in terms of time sensitiveness(Recency testing) 
Involved in training peers and documentation of various tests as a reference manual for future use 
Working on numerous projects involving comparing search results from Yahoo, Google and Bing, specializing in Google shortcuts. 
Was involved in various special projects which compare results provided by Yahoo and Bing and decide which results are better. Search Quality Analyst Yahoo! Summary I am a graduate of Kinesiology with business experience looking for an opportunity to start and grow into a rewarding career. I am able and willing to start at the bottom, prove my abilities, and work my way up.  
 
My business experience comes from working on a Google Maps project from its conception through the product launches of multiple countries. I was one of the first operators on the project where I helped build the foundation of the operation (application features, work progression, policy creation, training, etc.). I was promoted to a lead on the project and worked together with a team of leads, located in multiple countries, to continually improve the efficiency and quality of work. I took ownership of projects with hard deadlines, created and maintained multiple documents and spreadsheets, and managed a shift of 75 employees. I, also, traveled overseas to help build operations by interviewing, hiring and training over 1,000 candidates.  
 
I, also, have experience in athletic training, physical therapy, and have some laboratory experience working in a biochemistry lab.  
 
I am a fast learner, a hard worker and a natural leader. Feel free to contact me with any questions.
